net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_AE2_attackEditor
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Start the attack editor

arg(0) = Optional ID of token being updated
arg(1) = Optional Updated expressions from submit
arg(2) = Optional old action type from before the submit, also contains DnDBeyond Weapon & Spell data sepoarated by "-"
arg(3) = Optional New action type from after the submit
arg(4) = Optional Working copy being edited. Saved in
arg(5) = Optional Metadata used to save player options for the editor

Returns the editor ready to change the values for the current type of action
